title: [feature request] Removing hooks from module
body_html:
Hi,

One can easily add a forward hook with the function register_forward_hook. But it appears that there is no way to remove a hook. Looking in the code, I believe it is just a matter of deleting an entry in self._forward_hooks in the Module class. On the other hand it will be nice to have this as a function, rather than messing around with "private" attributes.

body:
Hi, 

One can easily add a forward hook with the function register_forward_hook. But it appears that there is no way to remove a hook. Looking in the code, I believe it is just a matter of deleting an entry in `self._forward_hooks` in the Module class. On the other hand it will be nice to have this as a function, rather than messing around with "private" attributes.
